prompts: Create a water-type Pokémon that can fly and has a friendly demeanor.
Show me a Pokémon with bright yellow and blue colors that looks like a bird.
Design a Pokémon that resembles a pelican and has unique aquatic abilities.
Imagine a Pokémon that thrives in wetlands and has a playful personality.
Generate a creature that embodies the spirit of both water and air.
I want to see a Pokémon that has large wings and a cheerful expression.
Make a Pokémon that is a mix of aquatic and flying traits, in charming colors.
